TopicTitle: So 1.1 is opening up a bunch of memory. Let's use it up!

Articles.Content: So now that the Unity 5 upgrade is poised to jump up our FPS lets talk about some fancy graphics options that might slow it back down! Im sure everyone wants clouds, we'll take that as a given, but what other nice visuals would people most be interested in? Improved textures? Auroras? Reflectivity? Planetshine? I know there are a ton of mods out there but I also remember some of the devs getting excited about what might be possible for stock once we got to this point. One little thing Id love to see are some nicer surface effects like dust clouds billowing out on landing, rover tracks and footprints.

These kinds of effects would be pretty sweet, especially together. I can imagine a hairy landing with sparks that leaves scratches and scuff marks on the fuselage.

Edited April 1, 2016 by HebaruSan
YES!! Add rover tracks! That would be so cool!

Stock clouds, mostly because the EVE ones hog memor- wait!

*rushes off to reinstall EVE*

Edited April 1, 2016 by MatttheCzar
